author: Adam Polomchak

text:
Trackmania is a brilliant game. Shame it's in decline. I hope Nadeo and TM community pull through.
The OST is really solid. My favourite track is probably "Tail Lights".
author: VoxAcies

text:
Gotta say I like the Valley soundtrack (which is also by Professor Kliq) a bit more, but I prefer Stadium as a game.
It's definitely worth checking out the games though. Especially now as Nadeo (the company who makes the games) are celebrating the 10 year anniversary of TrackMania this year, and because of that you can try out all the TM2 titles for free until December. Also there are some cool discount bundles if you want to buy the games. More info here: http://blog.maniaplanet.com/blog/2013/11/07/trackmania-is-celebrating-10-years-with-a-free-demo-celebration-packages/
author: frostBeule

author: BygPhattyPlus

text: Actually listened some TM today, Tic Tac is my favorite (Nations version). I played Trackmania Nations long time ago. That's a very good racing game with a track editor. Finally I had a game similar to Stunts from DOS era.
author: Engie's Video Game Music Dispenser

text: The Trackmania series has a great pumping soundtrack, I especially love this track. I've never played the game, but it seems like Trackmania 2 and its different expansions aren't doing too well community-wise. It's a shame as it had a lot of promise. You know you're going to have fun just looking at that wallpaper!
author: SupraDarky

text: That is so true, Gabe.  You know, after being subbed to you for over 1 year and a half, I've come to realize that your taste for VGM is absolutely incredible.  It's honestly the driving force for me to keep listening to video game music for as long as I live.  Keep up the great work as always!
author: Eric C.

text: it's a shame, honestly. i've bought all three trackmania2 games and i think they're really, really good. they deserve more love :(
author: Indextic

text:
The games are actually now 50% off and all have free demos.
I highly recommend to try them out.
I'm a huge fan of this series for the whole 10 years now.

I'm glad you like the soundtrack, there are more of them waiting for you.
author: SuperSavajin

text: Trust me, the game is fantastic. There seems to still be a few servers. The game is on sale for $5 on Steam. This is a great deal for a great game.

text: @KNEXBUILDER19 I would have bought it, but it doesn't seem to be any different than the Nations demo.
author: Neftolis Zulander

text: Try Canyon and Valley out.
author: SuperSavajin

text: @Neftolis Zulander that's what i thought... it's just better graphics, a crash engine, and better music. But Maniaplanet has this new thing where there are multi-environment servers which is pretty cool, but i cant log into them since i only own canyon and valley.. and people have been releasing some really creative title packs for the environments that i cant play since i dont have stadium, so there are a few more perks to stadium that have made me think about buying it. also there's the better editor...
